description: Alice and Bob discuss a product roadmap planning session 'sometime next week' with vague time references. Tests low-confidence extraction with assumptions.

events.title: Product Roadmap Planning
events.reasoning: Alice and Bob agree to meet 'next week' to plan the product roadmap. They narrow it down to Thursday or Friday afternoon but do not commit to a specific time. Bob mentions they will need 'a couple of hours at least.'
events.assumptions: Assumed Thursday afternoon based on 'Thursday or Friday' preference, Assumed 2-hour duration based on 'couple of hours' mention, Assumed 2 PM start as a reasonable afternoon slot

mock_llm_response.summary: Found 1 tentative event: product roadmap planning next week (time is vague).

notes: Reference datetime is Friday 2026-02-20. 'Next week' = week of Feb 23. 'Thursday or Friday afternoon' narrows to Feb 26-27. Tolerance is relaxed because the time is very imprecise - the speakers never commit to a specific day or time.
